contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 20, 1949 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest 1st Clydebank, 2nd CWS Manchester, 3rd Scottish CWS.
Hymn tune 1st CWS Manchester, 2nd Clydebank, 3rd Forfar.
Deportment 1st North Seaton, 2nd Forfar, 3rd Clydebank.
9 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:05 p.m. Feb. 13, 2014, 4:36 p.m.
1 City of Manchester Eric Ball Themes from Symphony no. 5 [Tchaikovsky, arr. Ball]
2 Cooperation Band Alex Mortimer On the Cornish Coast
3 Clydebank Burgh Band William Scholes
4 Forfar Instrumental Elgar Clayton
5 Crookhall Colliery Unknown
